name: The War of the 1812: The Conquest of Canada
name_original: The War of the 1812: The Conquest of Canada
description:
The War of the 1812: The Conquest of Canada is a strategy game developed by HPS Simulations. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by HPS Simulations.
The War of the 1812: The Conquest of Canada is available on PC.
